changes: Enhanced parseTemporalEvents() to include cross-document contradictions
Updated getMockTemporalResult() to include cross-document contradiction examples

patterns_discovered: Event similarity calculation using keyword and category matching
gotchas_discovered: Different document sources might describe same events with conflicting dates
References across documents can create timeline sequence impossibilities
Simple date comparison is insufficient for detecting semantic contradictions

key_achievements: Implemented robust cross-document timeline contradiction detection
Created flexible event signature and similarity comparison mechanism
Added multiple severity levels for contradiction detection

recommendations: Add more granular similarity calculation algorithms
Consider machine learning approaches for more advanced contradiction detection
